mapper.select: select d.id, d.name, d.age, d.sex, dl.name as level, d.phone, tt.name as type, d.hospital, d.createtime as createTime, d.updatetime as updateTime, d.account_id as accountId from doctor as d left outer join doctor_level as dl on d.level_id = dl.id left outer join treat_type as tt on d.type_id = tt.id where dl.name like #{level} limit #{offset}, #{count}
select count(*) from doctor as d left outer join doctor_level as dl on d.level_id = dl.id where dl.name like #{level}
mapper.insert: insert into doctor(name, age, sex, level_id, phone, type_id, hospital, updatetime, createtime, account_id) VALUE (#{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{levelId}, #{phone}, #{typeId}, #{hospital}, #{updateTime}, #{createTime}, #{accountId})
